website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for an inexpensive MP3 player for the gym, the RCA Jet--FM tuner, armband, stopwatch, and all--is a solid choice, but the interface will take some getting used to.
pros: The RCA Jet sounds good, is inexpensive, and offers an FM tuner and stopwatch
The player features a splash-proof design and includes sporty clip-on earphones, an armband, and a wristband
cons: The RCA Jet's color scheme may not appeal to everyone
Also, the control pad is stiff, the buttons are a bit unresponsive, and the menu structure is funky

customer_reviews.title: Item is in great shape, works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Item is in great shape, works perfectly, and was shipped promptly. Although an older item, this MP3 player is still fantastic. In a rugged body, long-lasting battery, and perfect set of features.
customer_reviews.author: Yanni Giftakis

customer_reviews.title: Dead battery
customer_reviews.text: I had the older version (500meg) for at least 3 years. It was the only mp3 that held up to sweat from the gym. Battery life was still excellent , however I lost it a few weeks ago. I bought the 1 gig as a replacement for the one I lost. The price was great, but the battery would not charge. I sent it back at amazon for a full refund without any problems. I'm not sure if I want to try again. Great product if you get one with a good battery
customer_reviews.author: Justme

customer_reviews.title: Ok MP3 player
customer_reviews.text: Granted, it's no Ipod, but this was bought for a former boyfriend 2 years ago. It still has good sound quality, he still has it, he still uses it to go running with, and it works fine. Mind you, he's dropped it, accidentally kicked it, his dog has licked it... All in all, it's pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Serenity

customer_reviews.title: RCA s2001 mp3 player
customer_reviews.text: I had previously used a small colby mp3 player which fits perfect in my shirt pocket. Then I crushed it when I was working. I bought the RCA to replace the colby. The RCA player constantly will turn itself off. When I try to fast forward it would often jump to the next song. The buttons are not very good. I did update the firmware, which did not improve the RCA. I bought another colby and I am please with it.
customer_reviews.author: laundryman

customer_reviews.title: BATTERY PROBLEM
customer_reviews.text: Alot of features but complicated to figure out. Sweet headphones but fragile. Best part is armband, i sleep with it on. Has lock but unnecessary cause buttons are semi hard to push. I read audiobooks are bad on this but you can record the radio. Battery doesn't last 15hours! More like 4 or more albums, given you use the right charger(5volts, 500mah).
customer_reviews.author: Important

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one in 8 years. I use it so much. I love It! It holds more than enough songs to do my workout routine. It is an awesome deal. Less than half the price I paid for my first one.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Did not work once
customer_reviews.text: The first time, I charged it up overnight. When I tried to use it, the battery was dead. So I charged it overnight again. Twenty minutes into my run, it went on the fritz, and began flashing random displays, and never worked again.
customer_reviews.author: Tyvo

customer_reviews.title: Not a Fan
customer_reviews.text: Does not work properly; will come on but wont stay on when power button is pressed. What more is it to say about a product that is obsolete?
customer_reviews.author: Monty

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if these are just too old, but they just don't work. Item did arrive in new packaging, but after charging and filling with songs, the device would not turn on unless plugged in. I need my MP3 player to be mobile. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Kelso

customer_reviews.title: RCA Jet Mp3 Player
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my needs! I'm thinking that they will make great stocking stuffers for everyone on my list. Fast shipping, easy to use and exactly what I need for running.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Wood

customer_reviews.title: Durable small player
customer_reviews.text: I made a purchase of this device several years ago and it was hard to find replacement parts ( the arm/wrist band ) becuase it was no longer available in stores. I even called RCA but no luck finding this model even though that hade a newer bigger Gig bite system but it too wasn't available. Amazon hade the device at a great price. I didn't want to use my cell phone for music storage.
customer_reviews.author: Robles1

customer_reviews.title: Simple
customer_reviews.text: Great for my mom to use when exercising on her bike. Simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Duncan

customer_reviews.title: RCS S2001 1GB Sport -- will not hold charge
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these "new" through Amazon. Both do not hold a charge. Once fully charge, I disconnect and assure the device is powered down. After about 12 hours I turn it on and the power is about 1/2. After about 24 hours of being off the battery has fully discharge and the device will not turn on again until charged again.
customer_reviews.author: tjrriver

customer_reviews.title: When item arrived the Mp3 box was open and half ...
customer_reviews.text: When item arrived the Mp3 box was open and half destroyed. Earphones and directions were missing not sure if it's new or not !!!
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Just bought one to give it to a girl in the shelter I work.It works great for the purpose I wanted it for. A great price too.
customer_reviews.author: MagdaleneMaria

customer_reviews.title: Mp3 player
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome product! It is smaller than I thought it would be, but tough little thing. Just right for my 9 yr old grandson for xmas! With bands that attach to the side "wings" hopefully it can't be left somewhere inadvertantly ;-))
customer_reviews.author: PvacOK

customer_reviews.title: rca mp3 player
customer_reviews.text: Unit arrived promptly and just as promptly stopped working, mp3 player is cheap, fragile, and worthless, furthermore there does not appear to be any easy way to return the unit for a refund. I finally ate the $25 and threw the mp3 player in the trash. totally useless!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: whiterabbit

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Nice, simple and easy. My daughter simply loves it when she goes to work out. Songs are easy to get to as well as the radio.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Internal battery won't stay charged
customer_reviews.text: I charged this thing after I first got it. It said "battery full" but it will not stay on for more than a minute then it dies. I have tried to recharge it numerous times and get the same result. Guess I learned my lesson about buying electronics over the internet. This thing is JUNK.
customer_reviews.author: Shane M

customer_reviews.title: Product does not work, Seller never returns any emails
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this product before and loved it. Recently purchased the same product but this new product does not work I was able to sync songs into it, but when trying to turn it on to finally play it, it never turns on. Charged the battery to max, nothing. Tried many different things, nothing. Tried several times to contact the seller to see if anything else I can do, or on how to swap this defective product for a working one, nothing. Seller never replied. I am familiar with this product on how to play it, but this one does not work one bit. Seller should of at least attempted a reply of the numerous attempts made
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Some troubles
customer_reviews.text: The first unit received was faulty...had to pay additional shipping back to RCA for repairs. Armband strap broke within 2 weeks. Sound quality is fine,however disappointed with armband strap and original unit.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Levene

customer_reviews.title: Jet mp3 player
customer_reviews.text: I had previously purchased 2 of these. Mine works fine but my husband steped on his so I purchased another one for him. This one (after 2 weeks) will not charge and now he is unable to use it at all.
customer_reviews.author: CozGirl2293

customer_reviews.title: Great for working out.
customer_reviews.text: This is way better than my ipod. For a tenth of the price I got this RCA jet and I think the headphones are far superior, it came with the strap for working out and a radio which did NOT come with the overpriced ipod. This mp3 player does not have pictures or videos but that is not what I wanted from an MP3 player. I strongly recommend this over the ipod. Especially, if it's just for work outs.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Ugh
customer_reviews.text: The description said it's Splashproof, but when my Mp3 got splashed by water, it just turned off! When I tried to turn it back on, it doesn't let me!! >:(
customer_reviews.author: Dong J Kim

customer_reviews.title: Short usage life...
customer_reviews.text: Got this mp3 player last year to ride my bike and listen to tunes.. At first it was great, worked great for two months. Then towards the end of the bike riding season, it snows here, the power on button became an issue, it became almost impossible to turn on and turn off. Then i shelved it for 6 months, and got it out again the other day and no power. Recharged it to full battery, Tried to turn it on no response. i the plugged it in and notice that it is not holding a charge now.. to the thrash with this junk... good luck if you get one.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom- loved the look and apparent durabilty. Boy was I wrong. After about 2 months of infrequent use (maybe 6 times total) the menu button fell off. The Amazon seller wouldn't return it past 30 days, RCA wasn't any help either. I continued to use it by keeping a paperclip attached to poke inti the hole where menu button was. After about a dozen more uses the UP volume stopped working. What a rip off. I think I'll go back to sansa.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This mp3 player has been a pain in the butt. It worked fine the first few times, but now the battery is always dead, and I've only used it 3 times before. It will play for a little while (1/2 hr workout) but be dead the next time I try to use it. I'm not organzied enough to charge it every time I use it. I used to have a Nike mp3 player that lasted forever, and I guess I expected this to be as reliable, as RCA is a goo brand, but I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Was great until it broke piece by piece
customer_reviews.text: I purchased RCA products before and never had mayor issues with them, this RCA player was a waste of money, the menu button broke off the first couple of months and then the battery started to die slowly until one day after recharging it through the USB connection it decided to stop working. Does have some nice features like the rubber padding on the buttons and the design itself but it's worth nothing if the product is so fragile (wasn't this supposed to be a sports player designed for every day use?). Anyways, I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro L. Roman Jr.

customer_reviews.title: No Problems So Far!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a plane trip in February. I still use Cds but it was too much to carry, so I figured I could download them to this. I've never had a problem with this until I LOST THE USB Cable. It downloaded music without a problem. I've been looking to find one cheap just for the Cable, but nothing so far...If someone is willing to sell me their USB Cable cheap, please let me know.
customer_reviews.author: H. Theriault

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive
customer_reviews.text: This unit sold for $34.00 at Wal-Mart two years ago and now $49.00 is ridiculous! I really like them but I can buy a new MP3 with much newer technology and greater storage anywhere.....to include Wal Mart. I would buy three of theses at $29.00 each. That is what it is worth with its old tech and limited storagr
customer_reviews.author: Sapper6

customer_reviews.title: great item!!
customer_reviews.text: i love it so far. it is very easy to transfer music to, and easy to use. the small size is great for workouts, or flying. i was surprised how easy it was to use, and transfer music to and from. the only thing i see wrong with it is that it has no hold button, and the menu is pretty extensive for just two buttons. other than that, i love it!! very easy, pretty cheap and good brand!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Rosser

customer_reviews.title: wont even sync
customer_reviews.text: so I've used this product no problem for over 2 years. until recently it hasn't been a problem. i cannot seem to get this thing to sync onto my computer. it says USB connected then just shuts off. I've tried restoring it and that just made it worse. software is complete crap. I've made better programs in a week. nothing online has helped me and i'm ready to just throw this thing away.
customer_reviews.author: ziggy

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Gym
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about six months now with no problems. It works great for what I use it for; working out. It's light weight, simple to use, and best of all you don't have to fool with any proprietary software; simply drag and drop your songs and off you go. My only complaint with this MP3 Player is the short battery life. I only use it for about an hour and a half every day, but I have to charge it every other day, or the battery will die.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Hargis

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: If you run and sweat a lot, this is the best thing for both. I have had it for two years in the rain, sweat, and anything else and it's never let me down for [...]. It is small enough to fit in a key pocket, and the simple controls are easy to hit while in your pocket. I am getting another one because the only thing it can't do is not be crushed by a car door :(. Better than a 200+ iPoo'ed
customer_reviews.author: N. Prisbe

customer_reviews.title: it is good for the money
customer_reviews.text: it is a good qaulity mp3 player the sound is great the picture qaulity is awsome the battery life last about 15 hours the controls are easy to use as well it feels comfortable and high built qaulity.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie moore

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a couple of years ago when I started working out. Easy to use. I feel it is user friendly. I love it. I have now bought one for my daugher for Christmas, who I know will love it!
customer_reviews.author: rosa

product_meta.title: Rca S2001 Jet Series Sports Mp3 Player (1 Gb)
product_meta.description: Product Packaging:Standard PackagingRCA S2001 JET SERIES SPORTS MP3 PLAYER (1 GB) 1 GB;AUDIO PLAYBACK;PLAYS MP3, WMA, PD-DRM9, AUDIBLE FORMATS;DIGITAL FM TUNER WITH FM RECORD, SINGLE-COLOR OLED DISPLAY, SPLASHPROOF, STOP WATCH & BMI COUNTER;UP TO 18 HOURS OF MUSIC PLAYBACK WITH RECHARGEABLE BATTERY;USB 2.0 PC INTERFACE;INCLUDES ACCESSORY KIT WITH ARMBAND, CD-ROM WITH YAHOO! MUSIC ENGINE & SPORT-CLIP SILICONE IN-EAR Eearphones
feature_bullets: Plays Mp3, Wma, Pd-Drm9, Audible Formats
Digital Fm Tuner With Fm Record, Single-Color Oled Display, Splashproof, Stop Watch & Bmi Counter
Up To 18 Hours Of Music Playback With Rechargeable Battery

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars53 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
